short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance YouTube with elegant static and dynamic themes. Transform your viewing experience with professionally designed styles.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
# YouTube Theme Suite

Enhance your YouTube experience with a collection of carefully crafted themes. This extension offers both static and dynamic color schemes to transform your viewing experience while maintaining YouTube's core functionality.

## Key Features

### Static Themes
Choose from sophisticated color presets:
- **Quantum**: Deep space-inspired dark interface
- **Coral**: Warm, rose-tinted design  
- **Arctic**: Cool, ice-inspired blues
- **Cyberpunk**: Neon pink accents on dark background
- **Emerald**: Nature-inspired green palette
- **Obsidian**: Sleek slate and navy design
- **Ultraviolet**: Rich purple color scheme

### Dynamic Themes
Interactive themes with animated effects:
- **Fire**: Pulsing red glow effects
- **Quantum**: Electric blue energy pulses
- **Aurora**: Shifting northern lights inspiration
- **Synthwave**: Retro-future neon transitions
- **Cyber**: Matrix-inspired green glow

### User-Friendly Features
- One-click theme switching
- Instant preview of changes
- Easy reset to default YouTube theme
- Seamless integration with YouTube's interface
- No account required
- Check/uncheck all settings with a single click
- Collapse/expand categories for better organization
- Toggle individual settings for a customized experience

### Customizable Settings
Control your YouTube interface with the following options:
- **Hide Video Buttons Bar**: Remove the video buttons for a cleaner look.
- **Hide Channel Info**: Conceal channel information from the video page.
- **Hide Description**: Option to hide the video description.
- **Hide Comments**: Disable comments section for distraction-free viewing.
- **Hide End Screen**: Remove end screen elements from videos.
- **Hide End Cards**: Disable end cards for a cleaner video experience.
- **Hide Live Chat**: Option to hide live chat during streams.
- **Hide Playlist**: Remove playlist elements from the video page.
- **Hide Recommendations**: Disable recommended videos for a focused experience.
- **Hide Header**: Remove the header for a minimalist look.
- **Hide Notification Bell**: Conceal the notification bell icon.
- **Hide Sidebar**: Remove the sidebar for a more focused experience.
- **Hide Shorts**: Eliminate the Shorts section from your feed.
- **Hide Homepage Feed**: Disable the homepage feed for a cleaner start page.
- **Hide Mix Playlists**: Remove mix playlists from the homepage.
- **Hide Merch & Offers**: Disable merchandise offers on the video page.
- **Hide Explore Tab**: Remove the Explore tab from the sidebar.
- **Hide More from YouTube**: Disable the "More from YouTube" section.
- **Hide Irrelevant Search Results**: Remove irrelevant search results from searches.
- **Hide Related Searches**: Disable related searches from the search results.
- **Hide Subscriptions**: Remove the subscriptions section from the sidebar.

### Technical Benefits
- Lightweight implementation
- Smooth animations and transitions
- Privacy-focused (no data collection)
- Blur effects for depth
- Consistent styling across all YouTube sections

Transform your YouTube interface with these meticulously designed themes, ranging from subtle professional looks to vibrant animated experiences. Each theme maintains full YouTube functionality while providing a fresh visual perspective.

*Note: This extension respects your privacy and doesn't collect any personal data.*
